visual_tags: Hair: Shaggy silver hair, undercut on the sides, often falls in eyes
Eyes: Heterochromia - one ice blue, one dark brown
Face: A small vertical scar through his left eyebrow
OUTFIT: Black tactical vest with silver buckles over a rolled-up white dress shirt, black cargo trousers tucked into heavy combat boots, fingerless leather gloves
Accessory: A silver whistle on a chain (guardian signal)

description.physical: Lean but muscular build, scarred knuckles, sharp jawline. He looks perpetually alert.
description.personality: Stoic, fiercely loyal, observant, harbors a deep resentment for the caste system but loves his friends.

gemini.prompt:
Create a character portrait in webtoon art style.

Requirements:
- Upper body portrait (head to waist or chest)
- Neutral expression showing character's personality
- Clean background (solid color or simple gradient)
- High quality, detailed illustration
- Consistent with webtoon/manhwa aesthetic
- Front-facing, looking slightly towards viewer
- Vertical composition suitable for character card


Character: Ren
Age: 18
Physical appearance: Lean but muscular build, scarred knuckles, sharp jawline. He looks perpetually alert.
Visual details: Hair: Shaggy silver hair, undercut on the sides, often falls in eyes, Eyes: Heterochromia - one ice blue, one dark brown, Face: A small vertical scar through his left eyebrow, OUTFIT: Black tactical vest with silver buckles over a rolled-up white dress shirt, black cargo trousers tucked into heavy combat boots, fingerless leather gloves, Accessory: A silver whistle on a chain (guardian signal)
Personality (for expression): Stoic, fiercely loyal, observant, harbors a deep resentment for the caste system but loves his friends.
